Git Gateway

# 

<span key="8fe83665def44dde8d8194f509cdc7eb"><span offset-key="8fe83665def44dde8d8194f509cdc7eb:0">Git Gateway</span></span>

<span key="3aaf0d0a181b4214a3bb74e14d4657a2"><span offset-key="3aaf0d0a181b4214a3bb74e14d4657a2:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://github.com/netlify/git-gateway" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="7f1e58b21a3f4c35883a43e6093b5e82" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="90f644306f7a40ac886d2c23741d0715"><span data-offset-key="90f644306f7a40ac886d2c23741d0715:0">Git Gateway</span></span></span></a><span key="df59e40857384ace98c82afb9dd90dba"><span offset-key="df59e40857384ace98c82afb9dd90dba:0"> is a Netlify open source project that allows you to add editors to your site CMS without giving them direct write access to your GitHub or GitLab repository. (For Bitbucket repositories, use the </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/bitbucket-backend/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="46775ea6b85a4c6fb80d467a69db9b42" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="e019004c809e49b09f8981becbe42787"><span data-offset-key="e019004c809e49b09f8981becbe42787:0">Bitbucket backend</span></span></span></a><span key="ff3c7390daab487f94e8390ff22391d5"><span offset-key="ff3c7390daab487f94e8390ff22391d5:0"> instead.)</span></span>

## 

<span key="426c3eab38d24173a06c1d73294df4da"><span offset-key="426c3eab38d24173a06c1d73294df4da:0">Git Gateway with Netlify</span></span>

<span key="98c2c438119c4b938c7d3f60dcb8eff5"><span offset-key="98c2c438119c4b938c7d3f60dcb8eff5:0">The </span></span><a href="https://www.netlify.com/docs/identity/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="20687c4c65b644388ffb615af5c81792" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="2bed2809af354383b9924a3165163a0b"><span data-offset-key="2bed2809af354383b9924a3165163a0b:0">Netlify Identity</span></span></span></a><span key="5335a8d7ab6d45f59e36e96feb6d56b8"><span offset-key="5335a8d7ab6d45f59e36e96feb6d56b8:0"> service can handle the authentication and provides a simple interface for user management. The Netlify CMS </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/start-with-a-template" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="d877eb4fd6d1492ca177ce2f2625ea22" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="e062b57f8f18446d95cff92d15d61d7d"><span data-offset-key="e062b57f8f18446d95cff92d15d61d7d:0">featured templates</span></span></span></a><span key="363939e907a24770a9a3d0b446e12d47"><span offset-key="363939e907a24770a9a3d0b446e12d47:0"> are working examples of this backend.</span></span>

<span key="ae33b02091cc405698362c2a6dcae40a"><span offset-key="ae33b02091cc405698362c2a6dcae40a:0">To use it in your own project stored on GitHub or GitLab, follow these steps:</span></span>

1.  <span class="r-1awozwy r-1nf4jbm r-6koalj r-18u37iz r-gg6oyi r-ubezar r-16dba41 r-135wba7 r-1m04atk r-1pyaxff" contenteditable="false" style="height:24px">1.</span>
    <span key="0220c0079bdf4229a04ceed5dd1a7ba7"><span offset-key="0220c0079bdf4229a04ceed5dd1a7ba7:0">Head over to the </span></span><a href="https://www.netlify.com/docs/identity" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="e68c1dce613d4b2f837c2e0397bcd47e" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="49bb371be56e41e9b5992c2da691a52e"><span data-offset-key="49bb371be56e41e9b5992c2da691a52e:0">Netlify Identity docs</span></span></span></a><span key="38debcce7f7e45a7a00c51d80ab95387"><span offset-key="38debcce7f7e45a7a00c51d80ab95387:0"> and follow the steps to get started.</span></span>

2.  <span class="r-1awozwy r-1nf4jbm r-6koalj r-18u37iz r-gg6oyi r-ubezar r-16dba41 r-135wba7 r-1m04atk r-1pyaxff" contenteditable="false" style="height:24px">2.</span>
    <span key="b78b490028974ccb82f2175c9403f058"><span offset-key="b78b490028974ccb82f2175c9403f058:0">Add the following lines to your Netlify CMS </span>`config.yml`<span offset-key="b78b490028974ccb82f2175c9403f058:2"> file:</span></span>

1

<span key="b23efef8e9b5448c95af1b82c84e2a2e"><span offset-key="b23efef8e9b5448c95af1b82c84e2a2e:0">backend:</span></span>

2

<span key="4ae695962c954bafa16a4d28cb7a7361"><span offset-key="4ae695962c954bafa16a4d28cb7a7361:0"> name: git-gateway</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7" />

Copied!

## 

<span key="aeca609be91d4e2d852a56367616ae91"><span offset-key="aeca609be91d4e2d852a56367616ae91:0">Reconnect after Changing Repository Permissions</span></span>

<span key="574fa9e43d744d508602f4fa90daee5b"><span offset-key="574fa9e43d744d508602f4fa90daee5b:0">If you change ownership on your repository, or convert a repository from public to private, you may need to reconnect Git Gateway with proper permissions. Find further instructions in the </span></span><a href="https://www.netlify.com/docs/git-gateway/#reconnect-after-changing-repository-permissions" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="843fef7bbe194a91aaaecf990e3ead05" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="ca0485a379d94fdabb76c84089417f9d"><span data-offset-key="ca0485a379d94fdabb76c84089417f9d:0">Netlify Git Gateway docs</span></span></span></a><span key="e8df4bb35a7a488f8adde27b21d88afa"><span offset-key="e8df4bb35a7a488f8adde27b21d88afa:0">.</span></span>

## 

<span key="dcba7d0866b749e79d219a8a80e15554"><span offset-key="dcba7d0866b749e79d219a8a80e15554:0">Git Gateway without Netlify</span></span>

<span key="876c57d1153949c59100eff3786199e5"><span offset-key="876c57d1153949c59100eff3786199e5:0">You can use </span></span><a href="https://github.com/netlify/git-gateway" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="9f0ceac18cdc4fc69c87507f31382724" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="a9e5797dde2a47449abe34be96da732f"><span data-offset-key="a9e5797dde2a47449abe34be96da732f:0">Git Gateway</span></span></span></a><span key="21adfbe4184248ac9ef35ff72ee2e3d2"><span offset-key="21adfbe4184248ac9ef35ff72ee2e3d2:0"> without Netlify by setting up your own Git Gateway server and connecting it with your own instance of </span></span><a href="https://www.gotrueapi.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="7eeebfd680f34c2bbf5778a77a188a4f" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="ca4ef78cd6c043538982f675be7d762d"><span data-offset-key="ca4ef78cd6c043538982f675be7d762d:0">GoTrue</span></span></span></a><span key="e0f195f6685d4990800c9f62a4969104"><span offset-key="e0f195f6685d4990800c9f62a4969104:0"> (the open source microservice that powers Netlify Identity), or with any other identity service that can issue JSON Web Tokens (JWT).</span></span>

<span key="e9c3f0dd7f9147fd9a4a8a0c6309fbf8"><span offset-key="e9c3f0dd7f9147fd9a4a8a0c6309fbf8:0">To configure in Netlify CMS, use the same </span>`backend`<span offset-key="e9c3f0dd7f9147fd9a4a8a0c6309fbf8:2"> settings in your Netlify CMS </span>`config.yml`<span offset-key="e9c3f0dd7f9147fd9a4a8a0c6309fbf8:4"> file as described in Step 2 of the </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/git-gateway-backend/#git-gateway-with-netlify-identity" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="a953a129d819419094af5df1d2e0cc0a" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="3b600938213d45fb8cad2b3de8635f5b"><span data-offset-key="3b600938213d45fb8cad2b3de8635f5b:0">Git Gateway with Netlify Identity</span></span></span></a><span key="b646fa394cd54962ac41ead62f7d141d"><span offset-key="b646fa394cd54962ac41ead62f7d141d:0"> instructions above.</span></span>

# 

<span key="07b00bea42034a9cbd0e498676b53132"><span offset-key="07b00bea42034a9cbd0e498676b53132:0">GitHub</span></span>

<span key="7fc163186e474a9fb142f7ad1c234c82"><span offset-key="7fc163186e474a9fb142f7ad1c234c82:0">For repositories stored on GitHub, the </span>`github`<span offset-key="7fc163186e474a9fb142f7ad1c234c82:2"> backend allows CMS users to log in directly with their GitHub account. Note that all users must have push access to your content repository for this to work.</span></span>

<span key="58e05407dba94504942ca65cae944dfd"><span offset-key="58e05407dba94504942ca65cae944dfd:0">Because Github </span></span><a href="https://github.com/netlify/netlify-cms/issues/663#issuecomment-335023723" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="91a9c8f7ecc74cdcae92281071068dea" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="9779591de9c941309b132362f6cb69f7"><span data-offset-key="9779591de9c941309b132362f6cb69f7:0">requires a server</span></span></span></a><span key="eefd028c3a984edcb4b451d32a0ecb93"><span offset-key="eefd028c3a984edcb4b451d32a0ecb93:0"> for authentication, Netlify facilitates basic GitHub authentication.</span></span>

<span key="93069c3ef9bc4926a8779da412f4d2e2"><span offset-key="93069c3ef9bc4926a8779da412f4d2e2:0">To enable basic GitHub authentication:</span></span>

1.  <span class="r-1awozwy r-1nf4jbm r-6koalj r-18u37iz r-gg6oyi r-ubezar r-16dba41 r-135wba7 r-1m04atk r-1pyaxff" contenteditable="false" style="height:24px">1.</span>
    <span key="003bc44a88cc42058c5b48264bfe52c5"><span offset-key="003bc44a88cc42058c5b48264bfe52c5:0">Follow the authentication provider setup steps in the </span></span><a href="https://www.netlify.com/docs/authentication-providers/#using-an-authentication-provider" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="eab4a90d450b43ff8e6d0b6340beccc5" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="d66137d533ff44ef8d949fc57415a28a"><span data-offset-key="d66137d533ff44ef8d949fc57415a28a:0">Netlify docs</span></span></span></a><span key="318c66890db241cd9543bfb56164ca56"><span offset-key="318c66890db241cd9543bfb56164ca56:0">.</span></span>

2.  <span class="r-1awozwy r-1nf4jbm r-6koalj r-18u37iz r-gg6oyi r-ubezar r-16dba41 r-135wba7 r-1m04atk r-1pyaxff" contenteditable="false" style="height:24px">2.</span>
    <span key="352379d94e274310bb5bcdd7b59cc7ad"><span offset-key="352379d94e274310bb5bcdd7b59cc7ad:0">Add the following lines to your Netlify CMS </span>`config.yml`<span offset-key="352379d94e274310bb5bcdd7b59cc7ad:2"> file:</span></span>

1

<span key="6b40609fcc214a7aba2aeef7d14f3aae"><span offset-key="6b40609fcc214a7aba2aeef7d14f3aae:0">backend:</span></span>

2

<span key="d01a0c960c6d4df2a0432de0fd04b565"><span offset-key="d01a0c960c6d4df2a0432de0fd04b565:0"> name: github</span></span>

3

<span key="b21d43b93b4243e4bac2628ca146a435"><span offset-key="b21d43b93b4243e4bac2628ca146a435:0"> repo: owner-name/repo-name # Path to your GitHub repository</span></span>

4

<span key="c0819393aee14f78b129708881a49dcd"><span offset-key="c0819393aee14f78b129708881a49dcd:0"> # optional, defaults to master</span></span>

5

<span key="09897342495f4b8ba1c132742d3d0485"><span offset-key="09897342495f4b8ba1c132742d3d0485:0"> # branch: main</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

## 

<span key="97419f91048c4d09b04cf481fface516"><span offset-key="97419f91048c4d09b04cf481fface516:0">Specifying a status for deploy previews</span></span>

<span key="ee9b98e5b5574b5084282174c0558369"><span offset-key="ee9b98e5b5574b5084282174c0558369:0">The GitHub backend supports </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/deploy-preview-links" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="595ffd9b5feb4859946a8caab764d0e8" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="ba1b5c975aee4935bc87a5a603a9b639"><span data-offset-key="ba1b5c975aee4935bc87a5a603a9b639:0">deploy preview links</span></span></span></a><span key="e7728f20f9a24a1fb318445cc3cb8aa8"><span offset-key="e7728f20f9a24a1fb318445cc3cb8aa8:0">. Netlify CMS checks the </span>`context`<span offset-key="e7728f20f9a24a1fb318445cc3cb8aa8:2"> of a commit's </span></span><a href="https://help.github.com/articles/about-status-checks/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="42a372af07694d63a26244a8a221c675" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="ea0f92c5ccb5422289fb2124a21d8e1e"><span data-offset-key="ea0f92c5ccb5422289fb2124a21d8e1e:0">statuses</span></span></span></a><span key="337bbd419c0b4162bfcd5bdf6b3ee14c"><span offset-key="337bbd419c0b4162bfcd5bdf6b3ee14c:0"> and infers one that seems to represent a deploy preview. If you need to customize this behavior, you can specify which context to look for using </span>`preview_context`<span offset-key="337bbd419c0b4162bfcd5bdf6b3ee14c:2">:</span></span>

1

<span key="13d54f2b9114482fbdfc2067f2178fc4"><span offset-key="13d54f2b9114482fbdfc2067f2178fc4:0">backend:</span></span>

2

<span key="0e4f4d81828742fd86d8957ea6ddc2de"><span offset-key="0e4f4d81828742fd86d8957ea6ddc2de:0"> name: github</span></span>

3

<span key="5d9da422510440a0903a286e3d2e4742"><span offset-key="5d9da422510440a0903a286e3d2e4742:0"> repo: my/repo</span></span>

4

<span key="9488bf3e4c9e4ec49da12b4d26a7cb54"><span offset-key="9488bf3e4c9e4ec49da12b4d26a7cb54:0"> preview\_context: my-provider/deployment</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="2d8120ce241f46ca948b3d7b7b08dd64"><span offset-key="2d8120ce241f46ca948b3d7b7b08dd64:0">The above configuration would look for the status who's </span>`"context"`<span offset-key="2d8120ce241f46ca948b3d7b7b08dd64:2"> is </span>`"my-provider/deployment"`<span offset-key="2d8120ce241f46ca948b3d7b7b08dd64:4">.</span></span>

# 

<span key="6118ec5a44bd481f84d412a896346127"><span offset-key="6118ec5a44bd481f84d412a896346127:0">Configuration Options</span></span>

## 

<span key="627b9ca6936a445986e1c1087373a719"><span offset-key="627b9ca6936a445986e1c1087373a719:0">Configuration File</span></span>

<span key="191e07ee557e43a1b15c2cf243b8a134"><span offset-key="191e07ee557e43a1b15c2cf243b8a134:0">All configuration options for Netlify CMS are specified in a </span>`config.yml`<span offset-key="191e07ee557e43a1b15c2cf243b8a134:2"> file, in the folder where you access the editor UI (usually in the </span>`/admin`<span offset-key="191e07ee557e43a1b15c2cf243b8a134:4"> folder).</span></span>

<span key="f7d3d9afac514a16b9d246c1c7d41db4"><span offset-key="f7d3d9afac514a16b9d246c1c7d41db4:0">Alternatively, you can specify a custom config file using a link tag:</span></span>

1

<span key="4afab94e512949b9b84ad8f3df446ea7"><span offset-key="4afab94e512949b9b84ad8f3df446ea7:0">&lt;!-- Note the "type" and "rel" attribute values, which are required. --></span></span>

2

<span key="f05420729c77412f9db8e3a6861e0622"><span offset-key="f05420729c77412f9db8e3a6861e0622:0">&lt;link href="path/to/config.yml" type="text/yaml" rel="cms-config-url"></span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="d1dc197b5f9d4c8792e70bfa3f0100d8"><span offset-key="d1dc197b5f9d4c8792e70bfa3f0100d8:0">To see working configuration examples, you can </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/start-with-a-template" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="6a2578bc57f34b43a7834c0e2c8d1dee" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="03c2c1b5267d47b698dee83fb919cbff"><span data-offset-key="03c2c1b5267d47b698dee83fb919cbff:0">start from a template</span></span></span></a><span key="d16f93b116074d43bd426b100918dfe9"><span offset-key="d16f93b116074d43bd426b100918dfe9:0"> or check out the </span></span><a href="https://cms-demo.netlify.com" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="9bdb034a69ba41ffbedb94858440c094" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="aa0d9a45ee9041faaad63d2e727feb2c"><span data-offset-key="aa0d9a45ee9041faaad63d2e727feb2c:0">CMS demo site</span></span></span></a><span key="d59fde52def14bc6b59da6905b645e86"><span offset-key="d59fde52def14bc6b59da6905b645e86:0">. (No login required: click the login button and the CMS will open.) You can refer to the demo </span></span><a href="https://github.com/netlify/netlify-cms/blob/master/dev-test/config.yml" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="61976758e1cd445987f98f35e1186257" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="7f3970571f5d4586891d2b8cfbd32ed4"><span data-offset-key="7f3970571f5d4586891d2b8cfbd32ed4:0">configuration code</span></span></span></a><span key="81e8ca1ed7b84f57a15877edd74b63a1"><span offset-key="81e8ca1ed7b84f57a15877edd74b63a1:0"> to see how each option was configured.</span></span>

<span key="08cb7afc0d434ba596af9244a4664667"><span offset-key="08cb7afc0d434ba596af9244a4664667:0">You can find details about all configuration options below. Note that </span></span><a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/YAML#Basic_components" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="ac01e35b2fdc4f2abdaf6a3246698060" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="4d80e132280045e7a84e601148e76ae1"><span data-offset-key="4d80e132280045e7a84e601148e76ae1:0">YAML syntax</span></span></span></a><span key="4490b075f7a044fabeb69148c7413f0d"><span offset-key="4490b075f7a044fabeb69148c7413f0d:0"> allows lists and objects to be written in block or inline style, and the code samples below include a mix of both.</span></span>

## 

<span key="8e35b6d6ee0a42eba0d3baa7cd8b50b5"><span offset-key="8e35b6d6ee0a42eba0d3baa7cd8b50b5:0">Backend</span></span>

<span key="1a356d6abcfe4efb9a782e5ffd737952">*This setting is required.*</span>

<span key="1b6ca75ea5f8410c991350a09dcda52f"><span offset-key="1b6ca75ea5f8410c991350a09dcda52f:0">The </span>`backend`<span offset-key="1b6ca75ea5f8410c991350a09dcda52f:2"> option specifies how to access the content for your site, including authentication. Full details and code samples can be found in </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/backends-overview" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="7c7c6bfa359c4722b6dc94a7594337b9" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="3b3d43bb5d3148c7b7d59203b11f1671"><span data-offset-key="3b3d43bb5d3148c7b7d59203b11f1671:0">Backends</span></span></span></a><span key="5503eae86e0148f9ae2b42afba1d8395"><span offset-key="5503eae86e0148f9ae2b42afba1d8395:0">.</span></span>

<span key="cf69c0b45c2f4390a3b9ea7a31410623">**Note**<span offset-key="cf69c0b45c2f4390a3b9ea7a31410623:1">: no matter where you access Netlify CMS â€” whether running locally, in a staging environment, or in your published site â€” it will always fetch and commit files in your hosted repository (for example, on GitHub), on the branch you configured in your Netlify CMS config.yml file. This means that content fetched in the admin UI will match the content in the repository, which may be different from your locally running site. It also means that content saved using the admin UI will save directly to the hosted repository, even if you're running the UI locally or in staging.</span></span>

## 

<span key="9106c463fe8b4e758cfeb04135d06515"><span offset-key="9106c463fe8b4e758cfeb04135d06515:0">Publish Mode</span></span>

<span key="4ef5a8109e6f4dd6aca23ce93da927ef"><span offset-key="4ef5a8109e6f4dd6aca23ce93da927ef:0">By default, all entries created or edited in the Netlify CMS are committed directly into the main repository branch.</span></span>

<span key="16cba4036a8d47b9b19746d338efb77e"><span offset-key="16cba4036a8d47b9b19746d338efb77e:0">The </span>`publish_mode`<span offset-key="16cba4036a8d47b9b19746d338efb77e:2"> option allows you to enable "Editorial Workflow" mode for more control over the content publishing phases. All unpublished entries will be arranged in a board according to their status, and they can be further reviewed and edited before going live.</span></span>

<span key="971f36eb15034d0b84b55a927de1f538">**Note:**<span offset-key="971f36eb15034d0b84b55a927de1f538:1"> Editorial workflow works with GitHub repositories, and support for GitLab and Bitbucket is </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/beta-features/#gitlab-and-bitbucket-editorial-workflow-support" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="3f7b719ea23e496cba09440a3e2387fe" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="f5a9faf2b6974f76873f0938d77e349e"><span data-offset-key="f5a9faf2b6974f76873f0938d77e349e:0">in beta</span></span></span></a><span key="3c445ee6189a414f9e7fcede06cd11c6"><span offset-key="3c445ee6189a414f9e7fcede06cd11c6:0">.</span></span>

<span key="fe3d4d2b6dc74ebd858b55a6fb71d4f7"><span offset-key="fe3d4d2b6dc74ebd858b55a6fb71d4f7:0">You can enable the Editorial Workflow with the following line in your Netlify CMS </span>`config.yml`<span offset-key="fe3d4d2b6dc74ebd858b55a6fb71d4f7:2"> file:</span></span>

1

<span key="faaea4fab5544fc4818332738ceaecb4"><span offset-key="faaea4fab5544fc4818332738ceaecb4:0"># /admin/config.yml</span></span>

2

<span key="8a6e33d756d24b3b9fd445bbbb64c413"><span offset-key="8a6e33d756d24b3b9fd445bbbb64c413:0">publish\_mode: editorial\_workflow</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="e007fc7b89b649beac9e8702faedfea0"><span offset-key="e007fc7b89b649beac9e8702faedfea0:0">From a technical perspective, the workflow translates editor UI actions into common Git commands:</span></span>

Actions in Netlify UI

Perform these Git actions

<span key="18ca9a139012468ab961e2b27d5352d1"><span offset-key="18ca9a139012468ab961e2b27d5352d1:0">Save draft</span></span>

<span key="28493cb57d8445bcbd12a837030c581a"><span offset-key="28493cb57d8445bcbd12a837030c581a:0">Commits to a new branch (named according to the pattern </span>`cms/collectionName/entrySlug`<span offset-key="28493cb57d8445bcbd12a837030c581a:2">), and opens a pull request</span></span>

<span key="604e6f2862db4628acce68e5f8c4187c"><span offset-key="604e6f2862db4628acce68e5f8c4187c:0">Edit draft</span></span>

<span key="d60cbfc2bb4842c8bcd333944cd0bf5b"><span offset-key="d60cbfc2bb4842c8bcd333944cd0bf5b:0">Pushes another commit to the draft branch/pull request</span></span>

<span key="722e72e637ac41efaa5f4614f434f527"><span offset-key="722e72e637ac41efaa5f4614f434f527:0">Approve and publish draft</span></span>

<span key="16cff3ccf0b64755b404d7cc42a67e76"><span offset-key="16cff3ccf0b64755b404d7cc42a67e76:0">Merges pull request and deletes branch</span></span>

## 

<span key="1faac3cb2e3c47d7a09f2373c13bb344"><span offset-key="1faac3cb2e3c47d7a09f2373c13bb344:0">Media and Public Folders</span></span>

<span key="9dba2552befe42a8a41880fc6dc6a7f4"><span offset-key="9dba2552befe42a8a41880fc6dc6a7f4:0">Netlify CMS users can upload files to your repository using the Media Gallery. The following settings specify where these files are saved, and where they can be accessed on your built site.</span></span>

### 

<span key="f9314ffcc2004c76b11e23369f35dbec"><span offset-key="f9314ffcc2004c76b11e23369f35dbec:0">Media Folder</span></span>

<span key="b2f4935654f7455d9d6c9d190da8ac42">*This setting is required.*</span>

<span key="61eab79c6acc421d88a323d536bdcf31"><span offset-key="61eab79c6acc421d88a323d536bdcf31:0">The </span>`media_folder`<span offset-key="61eab79c6acc421d88a323d536bdcf31:2"> option specifies the folder path where uploaded files should be saved, relative to the base of the repo.</span></span>

1

<span key="54520ec39d6b4197b5cc29ef7443b1f6"><span offset-key="54520ec39d6b4197b5cc29ef7443b1f6:0">media\_folder: "static/images/uploads"</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

### 

<span key="1ea9a72b31844f9a86368554930175eb"><span offset-key="1ea9a72b31844f9a86368554930175eb:0">Public Folder</span></span>

<span key="96ee463908da44c588ecced60798c182"><span offset-key="96ee463908da44c588ecced60798c182:0">The </span>`public_folder`<span offset-key="96ee463908da44c588ecced60798c182:2"> option specifies the folder path where the files uploaded by the media library will be accessed, relative to the base of the built site. For fields controlled by \[file\] or \[image\] widgets, the value of the field is generated by prepending this path to the filename of the selected file. Defaults to the value of </span>`media_folder`<span offset-key="96ee463908da44c588ecced60798c182:4">, with an opening </span>`/`<span offset-key="96ee463908da44c588ecced60798c182:6"> if one is not already included.</span></span>

1

<span key="a2851a597a6e41939b6fa62fdd0f49f6"><span offset-key="a2851a597a6e41939b6fa62fdd0f49f6:0">public\_folder: "/images/uploads"</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="288bde46429d481fb1f55b6e22b52795"><span offset-key="288bde46429d481fb1f55b6e22b52795:0">Based on the settings above, if a user used an image widget field called </span>`avatar`<span offset-key="288bde46429d481fb1f55b6e22b52795:2"> to upload and select an image called </span>`philosoraptor.png`<span offset-key="288bde46429d481fb1f55b6e22b52795:4">, the image would be saved to the repository at </span>`/static/images/uploads/philosoraptor.png`<span offset-key="288bde46429d481fb1f55b6e22b52795:6">, and the </span>`avatar`<span offset-key="288bde46429d481fb1f55b6e22b52795:8"> field for the file would be set to </span>`/images/uploads/philosoraptor.png`<span offset-key="288bde46429d481fb1f55b6e22b52795:10">.</span></span>

<span key="bb4c33619094464b871e9c1e49d65f5b"><span offset-key="bb4c33619094464b871e9c1e49d65f5b:0">This setting can be set to an absolute URL e.g. </span>`https://netlify.com/media`<span offset-key="bb4c33619094464b871e9c1e49d65f5b:2"> should you wish, however in general this is not advisable as content should have relative paths to other content.</span></span>

## 

<span key="9b13dd6385934d3e80f05e000ec8514d"><span offset-key="9b13dd6385934d3e80f05e000ec8514d:0">Media Library</span></span>

<span key="7f4d0a8426c84a4296e3f7828314f4ae"><span offset-key="7f4d0a8426c84a4296e3f7828314f4ae:0">Media library integrations are configured via the </span>`media_library`<span offset-key="7f4d0a8426c84a4296e3f7828314f4ae:2"> property, and its value should be an object with at least a </span>`name`<span offset-key="7f4d0a8426c84a4296e3f7828314f4ae:4"> property. A </span>`config`<span offset-key="7f4d0a8426c84a4296e3f7828314f4ae:6"> property can also be used for options that should be passed to the library in use.</span></span>

<span key="eccee48043044a1291e713a379a923a0">**Example:**</span>

1

<span key="bca3a58afbc14a54978f3d3aa9508994"><span offset-key="bca3a58afbc14a54978f3d3aa9508994:0">media\_library:</span></span>

2

<span key="2673485dd2e64a179349e9a0f9949104"><span offset-key="2673485dd2e64a179349e9a0f9949104:0"> name: uploadcare</span></span>

3

<span key="bce81c847bcf490096bdaff0b2b2f781"><span offset-key="bce81c847bcf490096bdaff0b2b2f781:0"> config:</span></span>

4

<span key="4cdcf5ffbbdf421f81dae20be9a8af81"><span offset-key="4cdcf5ffbbdf421f81dae20be9a8af81:0"> publicKey: demopublickey</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

## 

<span key="ab384fafbf1c4da58b2c5a989a38c69a"><span offset-key="ab384fafbf1c4da58b2c5a989a38c69a:0">Site URL</span></span>

<span key="3ca45a168cfe46349dfe4fc4ee23edaf"><span offset-key="3ca45a168cfe46349dfe4fc4ee23edaf:0">The </span>`site_url`<span offset-key="3ca45a168cfe46349dfe4fc4ee23edaf:2"> setting should provide a URL to your published site. May be used by the CMS for various functionality. Used together with a collection's </span>`preview_path`<span offset-key="3ca45a168cfe46349dfe4fc4ee23edaf:4"> to create links to live content.</span></span>

<span key="87d55d02665249a6bef2ba300dab7075">**Example:**</span>

1

<span key="c1293ba470214a55ae6717d592a727b1"><span offset-key="c1293ba470214a55ae6717d592a727b1:0">site\_url: https://your-site.com</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

## 

<span key="bb1699ee9d584f3686c44cd31a8869ae"><span offset-key="bb1699ee9d584f3686c44cd31a8869ae:0">Display URL</span></span>

<span key="add450923700483e9a41983442794504"><span offset-key="add450923700483e9a41983442794504:0">When the </span>`display_url`<span offset-key="add450923700483e9a41983442794504:2"> setting is specified, the CMS UI will include a link in the fixed area at the top of the page, allowing content authors to easily return to your main site. The text of the link consists of the URL without the protocol portion (e.g., </span>`your-site.com`<span offset-key="add450923700483e9a41983442794504:4">).</span></span>

<span key="391d04db52e34ac0bfe6540f5ae7a738"><span offset-key="391d04db52e34ac0bfe6540f5ae7a738:0">Defaults to </span>`site_url`<span offset-key="391d04db52e34ac0bfe6540f5ae7a738:2">.</span></span>

<span key="1c37c484c1584457bbce0ad2dd3bb900">**Example:**</span>

1

<span key="edfa558141f74ff1ac8ddc0560e68fb5"><span offset-key="edfa558141f74ff1ac8ddc0560e68fb5:0">display\_url: https://your-site.com</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

## 

<span key="1f2177118c8046ee9a6cf2a0cfc11069"><span offset-key="1f2177118c8046ee9a6cf2a0cfc11069:0">Custom Logo</span></span>

<span key="920e9d0307174a8b8c0acfa597cc3124"><span offset-key="920e9d0307174a8b8c0acfa597cc3124:0">When the </span>`logo_url`<span offset-key="920e9d0307174a8b8c0acfa597cc3124:2"> setting is specified, the CMS UI will change the logo displayed at the top of the login page, allowing you to brand the CMS with your own logo. </span>`logo_url`<span offset-key="920e9d0307174a8b8c0acfa597cc3124:4"> is assumed to be a URL to an image file.</span></span>

<span key="3461755a04a94e59b579395261ca63ee">**Example:**</span>

1

<span key="802c4a0f07da4f2cbcb68e65a4a3d1cf"><span offset-key="802c4a0f07da4f2cbcb68e65a4a3d1cf:0">logo\_url: https://your-site.com/images/logo.svg</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

## 

<span key="f7037762ae6345519262bc8d8cc60895"><span offset-key="f7037762ae6345519262bc8d8cc60895:0">Locale</span></span>

<span key="10624e8b8e3c4074850a91d3fc32a59c"><span offset-key="10624e8b8e3c4074850a91d3fc32a59c:0">The CMS locale.</span></span>

<span key="7ba47a22edb44d5e8c7ceeb56a4ebd66"><span offset-key="7ba47a22edb44d5e8c7ceeb56a4ebd66:0">Defaults to </span>`en`<span offset-key="7ba47a22edb44d5e8c7ceeb56a4ebd66:2">.</span></span>

<span key="943aabef397f4973a6c0c47bbd983788"><span offset-key="943aabef397f4973a6c0c47bbd983788:0">Other languages than English must be registered manually.</span></span>

<span key="526b6c1180cc45f393c24a84605cab6f">**Example**</span>

<span key="66d7c5c99cf64a9f8b932d92cf30cf57"><span offset-key="66d7c5c99cf64a9f8b932d92cf30cf57:0">In your </span>`config.yml`<span offset-key="66d7c5c99cf64a9f8b932d92cf30cf57:2">:</span></span>

1

<span key="847910bfbc864990880ecf06ddab87d4"><span offset-key="847910bfbc864990880ecf06ddab87d4:0">locale: 'de'</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="6597610cc98f49e3906efb9bae01c21a"><span offset-key="6597610cc98f49e3906efb9bae01c21a:0">And in your custom JavaScript code:</span></span>

1

<span key="26ad7f48107d46f29ee8d74abcd355af"><span offset-key="26ad7f48107d46f29ee8d74abcd355af:0">import CMS from 'netlify-cms-app';</span></span>

2

<span key="d4f6ab23ccec4f0eacc6d712c165a186"><span offset-key="d4f6ab23ccec4f0eacc6d712c165a186:0">import { de } from 'netlify-cms-locales';</span></span>

3

<span key="7ffe52572a2441718c2c903f21d9e84e"><span offset-key="7ffe52572a2441718c2c903f21d9e84e:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">â€‹</span></span></span>

4

<span key="6bf62a25edca4bd7b32d2263eb714921"><span offset-key="6bf62a25edca4bd7b32d2263eb714921:0">CMS.registerLocale('de', de);</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="f7268e8f7fb24805928d9831ec1bafa2"><span offset-key="f7268e8f7fb24805928d9831ec1bafa2:0">When a translation for the selected locale is missing the English one will be used.</span></span>

> <span key="b2190e14eb9a4089b064fb2dee9b4251"><span offset-key="b2190e14eb9a4089b064fb2dee9b4251:0">When importing </span>`netlify-cms`<span offset-key="b2190e14eb9a4089b064fb2dee9b4251:2"> all locales are registered by default (so you only need to update your </span>`config.yml`<span offset-key="b2190e14eb9a4089b064fb2dee9b4251:4">).</span></span>

## 

<span key="3f93c2426b8e4112a0b1da5ec83f1b1e"><span offset-key="3f93c2426b8e4112a0b1da5ec83f1b1e:0">Show Preview Links</span></span>

<span key="bb82515dd2044583b58c3ee42693fadc"><span offset-key="bb82515dd2044583b58c3ee42693fadc:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/deploy-preview-links" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="09befb846b65444a8fa3c553d2a4b13f" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="fa976890b9a04ea19364cf905090dd08"><span data-offset-key="fa976890b9a04ea19364cf905090dd08:0">Deploy preview links</span></span></span></a><span key="ca29a2aeed9943b599e4d29ba39dda95"><span offset-key="ca29a2aeed9943b599e4d29ba39dda95:0"> can be disabled by setting </span>`show_preview_links`<span offset-key="ca29a2aeed9943b599e4d29ba39dda95:2"> to </span>`false`<span offset-key="ca29a2aeed9943b599e4d29ba39dda95:4">.</span></span>

<span key="cab177f881424b42abc4f445eb1ed056">**Example:**</span>

1

<span key="3f7f8bc2f92648a59748aaa779ed6a90"><span offset-key="3f7f8bc2f92648a59748aaa779ed6a90:0">show\_preview\_links: false</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

## 

<span key="9d5fbd9b63c74b5fbb6a2d288473b66f"><span offset-key="9d5fbd9b63c74b5fbb6a2d288473b66f:0">Search</span></span>

<span key="02253faf71f64d3a91be224fc811c131"><span offset-key="02253faf71f64d3a91be224fc811c131:0">The search functionally requires loading all collection(s) entries, which can exhaust rate limits on large repositories. It can be disabled by setting the top level </span>`search`<span offset-key="02253faf71f64d3a91be224fc811c131:2"> property to </span>`false`<span offset-key="02253faf71f64d3a91be224fc811c131:4">.</span></span>

<span key="90f37bbbc4294a3fa67e746e08e2f202"><span offset-key="90f37bbbc4294a3fa67e746e08e2f202:0">Defaults to </span>`true`</span>

<span key="a4559d20bffd4fc1b389f9767b305563">**Example:**</span>

1

<span key="f1b7bdd25b184ca6b3d141a1dd470e51"><span offset-key="f1b7bdd25b184ca6b3d141a1dd470e51:0">search: false</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

## 

<span key="a339b4005b854d59a22aaa3888faff08"><span offset-key="a339b4005b854d59a22aaa3888faff08:0">Slug Type</span></span>

<span key="7bbffd904d814041ba24dc25a73e1beb"><span offset-key="7bbffd904d814041ba24dc25a73e1beb:0">The </span>`slug`<span offset-key="7bbffd904d814041ba24dc25a73e1beb:2"> option allows you to change how filenames for entries are created and sanitized. It also applies to filenames of media inserted via the default media library. For modifying the actual data in a slug, see the per-collection option below.</span></span>

<span key="9e622128e62346278bdce91fe17f94ab">`slug`<span offset-key="9e622128e62346278bdce91fe17f94ab:1"> accepts multiple options:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="6fbfb68f01a7424e96f7783195dd855d">`encoding`</span>

    -   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

        <span key="9aab931bb9ca4bb2ab7f96d562e45c08">`unicode`<span offset-key="9aab931bb9ca4bb2ab7f96d562e45c08:1"> (default): Sanitize filenames (slugs) according to </span></span><a href="https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3987" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="ed82a31181bc428f9fd70b90e0b158cc" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="ebb7d676b1204254ad1b5a3ffe789be1"><span data-offset-key="ebb7d676b1204254ad1b5a3ffe789be1:0">RFC3987</span></span></span></a><span key="7239b94f94f7452a926f00b89ce0b7ca"><span offset-key="7239b94f94f7452a926f00b89ce0b7ca:0"> and the </span></span><a href="https://url.spec.whatwg.org" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="eb12c1cd27b448b0b188874cf5ee0306" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="455ba3ca88dd4243bebd10df7331e063"><span data-offset-key="455ba3ca88dd4243bebd10df7331e063:0">WHATWG URL spec</span></span></span></a><span key="2a51c1eff6454f359fddfbcacdd2bb4a"><span offset-key="2a51c1eff6454f359fddfbcacdd2bb4a:0">. This spec allows non-ASCII (or non-Latin) characters to exist in URLs.</span></span>

    -   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

        <span key="8bf6b0dbd6154f93b489284ba105639e">`ascii`<span offset-key="8bf6b0dbd6154f93b489284ba105639e:1">: Sanitize filenames (slugs) according to </span></span><a href="https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="d9ec4bc4ba9a4ec991b55a14227c427d" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="531506b19355453c8499f0448a47ac1a"><span data-offset-key="531506b19355453c8499f0448a47ac1a:0">RFC3986</span></span></span></a><span key="7f1044b1a9d94e128dfe33f84cdd780f"><span offset-key="7f1044b1a9d94e128dfe33f84cdd780f:0">. The only allowed characters are (0-9, a-z, A-Z, </span>`_`<span offset-key="7f1044b1a9d94e128dfe33f84cdd780f:2">, </span>`-`<span offset-key="7f1044b1a9d94e128dfe33f84cdd780f:4">, </span>`~`<span offset-key="7f1044b1a9d94e128dfe33f84cdd780f:6">).</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="508ec9867f2b4a5aaffb459f9bc06075">`clean_accents`<span offset-key="508ec9867f2b4a5aaffb459f9bc06075:1">: Set to </span>`true`<span offset-key="508ec9867f2b4a5aaffb459f9bc06075:3"> to remove diacritics from slug characters before sanitizing. This is often helpful when using </span>`ascii`<span offset-key="508ec9867f2b4a5aaffb459f9bc06075:5"> encoding.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="89dd65215c4c445abfc43379e9874929">`sanitize_replacement`<span offset-key="89dd65215c4c445abfc43379e9874929:1">: The replacement string used to substitute unsafe characters, defaults to </span>`-`<span offset-key="89dd65215c4c445abfc43379e9874929:3">.</span></span>

<span key="b7edf0e0958143a6a81969395832cdfe">**Example**</span>

1

<span key="fa38737a58dd4ecfb862c1d719428d3d"><span offset-key="fa38737a58dd4ecfb862c1d719428d3d:0">slug:</span></span>

2

<span key="2ef54e24501e48ddaf35518b9ea0553f"><span offset-key="2ef54e24501e48ddaf35518b9ea0553f:0"> encoding: "ascii"</span></span>

3

<span key="01de46e6feca403cb8d2f508e37a7fa3"><span offset-key="01de46e6feca403cb8d2f508e37a7fa3:0"> clean\_accents: true</span></span>

4

<span key="06127d4de0844465ad2bfe2fd19ef2f8"><span offset-key="06127d4de0844465ad2bfe2fd19ef2f8:0"> sanitize\_replacement: "\_"</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

## 

<span key="78ff491fd3bd4ac9b5c2ff3bd6802b1d"><span offset-key="78ff491fd3bd4ac9b5c2ff3bd6802b1d:0">Collections</span></span>

<span key="144c848b32ed4f9595c9be2cbaf6817e">*This setting is required.*</span>

<span key="831adea57bb34a2fa04304f233cd46e0"><span offset-key="831adea57bb34a2fa04304f233cd46e0:0">The </span>`collections`<span offset-key="831adea57bb34a2fa04304f233cd46e0:2"> setting is the heart of your Netlify CMS configuration, as it determines how content types and editor fields in the UI generate files and content in your repository. Each collection you configure displays in the left sidebar of the Content page of the editor UI, in the order they are entered into your Netlify CMS </span>`config.yml`<span offset-key="831adea57bb34a2fa04304f233cd46e0:4"> file.</span></span>

<span key="c3f06884c10e40118e2ded86917eb9aa">`collections`<span offset-key="c3f06884c10e40118e2ded86917eb9aa:1"> accepts a list of collection objects, each with the following options:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="00ed85b5fff3497d90b48206eaed58e7">`name`<span offset-key="00ed85b5fff3497d90b48206eaed58e7:1"> (required): unique identifier for the collection, used as the key when referenced in other contexts (like the </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/widgets/#relation" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="db60f518df5a4c08b8aa7d47e964b0e0" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="ebe1beba35a744fca211c192f80c8cf3"><span data-offset-key="ebe1beba35a744fca211c192f80c8cf3:0">relation widget</span></span></span></a><span key="60c524cb37964e7dbf21f0b271fdd539"><span offset-key="60c524cb37964e7dbf21f0b271fdd539:0">)</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="e3770d096ec94372983f5d29f3cfaffa">`identifier_field`<span offset-key="e3770d096ec94372983f5d29f3cfaffa:1">: see detailed description below</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="1837fabc674a47e298834092bfd1a044">`label`<span offset-key="1837fabc674a47e298834092bfd1a044:1">: label for the collection in the editor UI; defaults to the value of </span>`name`</span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="eac5184a73df4a9597aca152ed712c4c">`label_singular`<span offset-key="eac5184a73df4a9597aca152ed712c4c:1">: singular label for certain elements in the editor; defaults to the value of </span>`label`</span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="2bed5da1a72f4da0944a55ed9fbe89b5">`description`<span offset-key="2bed5da1a72f4da0944a55ed9fbe89b5:1">: optional text, displayed below the label when viewing a collection</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="fe9310b9fccc4062830eaac9aa8fe217">`files`<span offset-key="fe9310b9fccc4062830eaac9aa8fe217:1"> or </span>`folder`<span offset-key="fe9310b9fccc4062830eaac9aa8fe217:3"> (requires one of these): specifies the collection type and location; details in </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/collection-types" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="12c6705fa04f46588e8500e8a540c250" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="1ef83bdefdf24c23a53e16f549fc09b0"><span data-offset-key="1ef83bdefdf24c23a53e16f549fc09b0:0">Collection Types</span></span></span></a><span key="ddfb4690bb3d4b6eabaae304eb6e0eaa"><span offset-key="ddfb4690bb3d4b6eabaae304eb6e0eaa:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="4a869d674e0645e3b3dd60e4bf0adc04">`filter`<span offset-key="4a869d674e0645e3b3dd60e4bf0adc04:1">: optional filter for </span>`folder`<span offset-key="4a869d674e0645e3b3dd60e4bf0adc04:3"> collections; details in </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/collection-types" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="9299f8fb7f264fc99115b8c14d8c46c7" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="f2ac444a334e47f78452b12cc0fd5238"><span data-offset-key="f2ac444a334e47f78452b12cc0fd5238:0">Collection Types</span></span></span></a><span key="ad85829579fa469eb5016686ab1e1faa"><span offset-key="ad85829579fa469eb5016686ab1e1faa:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="1719022837c44fde9d43d8ce5af3467b">`create`<span offset-key="1719022837c44fde9d43d8ce5af3467b:1">: for </span>`folder`<span offset-key="1719022837c44fde9d43d8ce5af3467b:3"> collections only; </span>`true`<span offset-key="1719022837c44fde9d43d8ce5af3467b:5"> allows users to create new items in the collection; defaults to </span>`false`</span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="c90ef1eed4e64e70b5d036baed7723ec">`publish`<span offset-key="c90ef1eed4e64e70b5d036baed7723ec:1">: for </span>`publish_mode: editorial_workflow`<span offset-key="c90ef1eed4e64e70b5d036baed7723ec:3"> only; </span>`false`<span offset-key="c90ef1eed4e64e70b5d036baed7723ec:5"> hides UI publishing controls for a collection; defaults to </span>`true`</span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="7c83f07709b7401ca143d7d68223ce38">`hide`<span offset-key="7c83f07709b7401ca143d7d68223ce38:1">: </span>`true`<span offset-key="7c83f07709b7401ca143d7d68223ce38:3"> hides a collection in the CMS UI; defaults to </span>`false`<span offset-key="7c83f07709b7401ca143d7d68223ce38:5">. Useful when using the relation widget to hide referenced collections.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="d277035908fd4b29a208113387a977a8">`delete`<span offset-key="d277035908fd4b29a208113387a977a8:1">: </span>`false`<span offset-key="d277035908fd4b29a208113387a977a8:3"> prevents users from deleting items in a collection; defaults to </span>`true`</span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="8e0330d5b1a6470295e57bd9c3dac509">`extension`<span offset-key="8e0330d5b1a6470295e57bd9c3dac509:1">: see detailed description below</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="d20d101bc8f44f9cba2a403f1927a8f5">`format`<span offset-key="d20d101bc8f44f9cba2a403f1927a8f5:1">: see detailed description below</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="64963e3e6f9c42f4950b8232b231760a">`frontmatter_delimiter`<span offset-key="64963e3e6f9c42f4950b8232b231760a:1">: see detailed description under </span>`format`</span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="1c659ac8fc724d06bf3ae57286ad9b53">`slug`<span offset-key="1c659ac8fc724d06bf3ae57286ad9b53:1">: see detailed description below</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="a949e4d9aace4cb49b95308f945513a1">`preview_path`<span offset-key="a949e4d9aace4cb49b95308f945513a1:1">: see detailed description below</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="8b33fa153d40417bb8da348f744764b6">`preview_path_date_field`<span offset-key="8b33fa153d40417bb8da348f744764b6:1">: see detailed description below</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="509a53e27d1b4fabbdafeedaa3e64cac">`fields`<span offset-key="509a53e27d1b4fabbdafeedaa3e64cac:1"> (required): see detailed description below</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="261f4276669c487bb66156d330cc4f8f">`editor`<span offset-key="261f4276669c487bb66156d330cc4f8f:1">: see detailed description below</span></span>
