    <span key="21ca96e85d8a483da8d84568d8c7e690">`summary`<span offset-key="21ca96e85d8a483da8d84568d8c7e690:1">: see detailed description below</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="a13b27b5128b4d4094e0bcf69e23a5df">`sortable_fields`<span offset-key="a13b27b5128b4d4094e0bcf69e23a5df:1">: see detailed description below</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="61b9d1c372554c408d756c60cca32455">`view_filters`<span offset-key="61b9d1c372554c408d756c60cca32455:1">: see detailed description below</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="4543081ee31b4e95a3068eeb58357378">`view_groups`<span offset-key="4543081ee31b4e95a3068eeb58357378:1">: see detailed description below</span></span>

<span key="fc8df227a5364fbcbac7891c55e8806f"><span offset-key="fc8df227a5364fbcbac7891c55e8806f:0">The last few options require more detailed information.</span></span>

### 

<span key="3c4c072214e7479e8178f7f2ceae1c82">`identifier_field`</span>

<span key="b1a6186ca67a43668090ccdd4ca2b2fd"><span offset-key="b1a6186ca67a43668090ccdd4ca2b2fd:0">Netlify CMS expects every entry to provide a field named </span>`"title"`<span offset-key="b1a6186ca67a43668090ccdd4ca2b2fd:2"> that serves as an identifier for the entry. The identifier field serves as an entry's title when viewing a list of entries, and is used in </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/configuration-options/#slug" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="d4396810b4fa48b49a6094b743971260" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="dcc7a4a65b6742ca9ef3ee1868ab5037"><span data-offset-key="dcc7a4a65b6742ca9ef3ee1868ab5037:0">slug</span></span></span></a><span key="68bbdb64bb3441fb9e8a410db477ff78"><span offset-key="68bbdb64bb3441fb9e8a410db477ff78:0"> creation. If you would like to use a field other than </span>`"title"`<span offset-key="68bbdb64bb3441fb9e8a410db477ff78:2"> as the identifier, you can set </span>`identifier_field`<span offset-key="68bbdb64bb3441fb9e8a410db477ff78:4"> to the name of the other field.</span></span>

<span key="cd2dfcc178d544b3994899ab102ce1bc">**Example**</span>

1

<span key="5e2c5bec9f3d468893ef5e7a44ae0535"><span offset-key="5e2c5bec9f3d468893ef5e7a44ae0535:0">collections:</span></span>

2

<span key="c3ce3a5ec8fc44deaca424c6c2bb5deb"><span offset-key="c3ce3a5ec8fc44deaca424c6c2bb5deb:0"> - name: posts</span></span>

3

<span key="aab228773caf466fa37778174f451482"><span offset-key="aab228773caf466fa37778174f451482:0"> identifier\_field: name</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

### 

<span key="9ab1d4f528b04f32a57f37f7cee36217">`extension`<span offset-key="9ab1d4f528b04f32a57f37f7cee36217:1"> and </span>`format`</span>

<span key="3b2237960e184597befc660394c5f8a8"><span offset-key="3b2237960e184597befc660394c5f8a8:0">These settings determine how collection files are parsed and saved. Both are optionalâ€”Netlify CMS will attempt to infer your settings based on existing items in the collection. If your collection is empty, or you'd like more control, you can set these fields explicitly.</span></span>

<span key="d3f3419fc07149cb83979c5d9e6a41f9">`extension`<span offset-key="d3f3419fc07149cb83979c5d9e6a41f9:1"> determines the file extension searched for when finding existing entries in a folder collection and it determines the file extension used to save new collection items. It accepts the following values: </span>`yml`<span offset-key="d3f3419fc07149cb83979c5d9e6a41f9:3">, </span>`yaml`<span offset-key="d3f3419fc07149cb83979c5d9e6a41f9:5">, </span>`toml`<span offset-key="d3f3419fc07149cb83979c5d9e6a41f9:7">, </span>`json`<span offset-key="d3f3419fc07149cb83979c5d9e6a41f9:9">, </span>`md`<span offset-key="d3f3419fc07149cb83979c5d9e6a41f9:11">, </span>`markdown`<span offset-key="d3f3419fc07149cb83979c5d9e6a41f9:13">, </span>`html`<span offset-key="d3f3419fc07149cb83979c5d9e6a41f9:15">.</span></span>

<span key="a366c709248a41c3ab5983d40f718400"><span offset-key="a366c709248a41c3ab5983d40f718400:0">You may also specify a custom </span>`extension`<span offset-key="a366c709248a41c3ab5983d40f718400:2"> not included in the list above, as long as the collection files can be parsed and saved in one of the supported formats below.</span></span>

<span key="bbf7c08f31db487a9b28491c4adadb38">`format`<span offset-key="bbf7c08f31db487a9b28491c4adadb38:1"> determines how collection files are parsed and saved. It will be inferred if the </span>`extension`<span offset-key="bbf7c08f31db487a9b28491c4adadb38:3"> field or existing collection file extensions match one of the supported extensions above. It accepts the following values:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="0b73bf7fe4f84c319a81cd5bd0051b1c">`yml`<span offset-key="0b73bf7fe4f84c319a81cd5bd0051b1c:1"> or </span>`yaml`<span offset-key="0b73bf7fe4f84c319a81cd5bd0051b1c:3">: parses and saves files as YAML-formatted data files; saves with </span>`yml`<span offset-key="0b73bf7fe4f84c319a81cd5bd0051b1c:5"> extension by default</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="4c8a918099e14d08b48fcfc728f9395b">`toml`<span offset-key="4c8a918099e14d08b48fcfc728f9395b:1">: parses and saves files as TOML-formatted data files; saves with </span>`toml`<span offset-key="4c8a918099e14d08b48fcfc728f9395b:3"> extension by default</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="3e20344348324f379963c4e352b5ac3c">`json`<span offset-key="3e20344348324f379963c4e352b5ac3c:1">: parses and saves files as JSON-formatted data files; saves with </span>`json`<span offset-key="3e20344348324f379963c4e352b5ac3c:3"> extension by default</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="cac82b643f4147709f8385f59f6145c4">`frontmatter`<span offset-key="cac82b643f4147709f8385f59f6145c4:1">: parses files and saves files with data frontmatter followed by an unparsed body text (edited using a </span>`body`<span offset-key="cac82b643f4147709f8385f59f6145c4:3"> field); saves with </span>`md`<span offset-key="cac82b643f4147709f8385f59f6145c4:5"> extension by default; default for collections that can't be inferred. Collections with </span>`frontmatter`<span offset-key="cac82b643f4147709f8385f59f6145c4:7"> format (either inferred or explicitly set) can parse files with frontmatter in YAML, TOML, or JSON format. However, they will be saved with YAML frontmatter.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="4740977087a345b989318b5f63c20d7a">`yaml-frontmatter`<span offset-key="4740977087a345b989318b5f63c20d7a:1">: same as the </span>`frontmatter`<span offset-key="4740977087a345b989318b5f63c20d7a:3"> format above, except frontmatter will be both parsed and saved only as YAML, followed by unparsed body text. The default delimiter for this option is </span>`---`<span offset-key="4740977087a345b989318b5f63c20d7a:5">.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="64f43198e0cb49dba9d89fabcd78fe5c">`toml-frontmatter`<span offset-key="64f43198e0cb49dba9d89fabcd78fe5c:1">: same as the </span>`frontmatter`<span offset-key="64f43198e0cb49dba9d89fabcd78fe5c:3"> format above, except frontmatter will be both parsed and saved only as TOML, followed by unparsed body text. The default delimiter for this option is </span>`+++`<span offset-key="64f43198e0cb49dba9d89fabcd78fe5c:5">.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="ba8b4ea9b6b34473861b1962aa0c07e9">`json-frontmatter`<span offset-key="ba8b4ea9b6b34473861b1962aa0c07e9:1">: same as the </span>`frontmatter`<span offset-key="ba8b4ea9b6b34473861b1962aa0c07e9:3"> format above, except frontmatter will be both parsed and saved as JSON, followed by unparsed body text. The default delimiter for this option is </span>`{`<span offset-key="ba8b4ea9b6b34473861b1962aa0c07e9:5"> </span>`}`<span offset-key="ba8b4ea9b6b34473861b1962aa0c07e9:7">.</span></span>

### 

<span key="961f7240d04247cd9a6e5cd6bf945ac7">`frontmatter_delimiter`</span>

<span key="4c9a789f03724fc497942f43c541a1b4"><span offset-key="4c9a789f03724fc497942f43c541a1b4:0">If you have an explicit frontmatter format declared, this option allows you to specify a custom delimiter like </span>`~~~`<span offset-key="4c9a789f03724fc497942f43c541a1b4:2">. If you need different beginning and ending delimiters, you can use an array like </span>`["(", ")"]`<span offset-key="4c9a789f03724fc497942f43c541a1b4:4">.</span></span>

### 

<span key="48a6a4794db84edca9cf267170dce29c">`slug`</span>

<span key="88afe20ccdef4aab893f54aff46f0ee7"><span offset-key="88afe20ccdef4aab893f54aff46f0ee7:0">For folder collections where users can create new items, the </span>`slug`<span offset-key="88afe20ccdef4aab893f54aff46f0ee7:2"> option specifies a template for generating new filenames based on a file's creation date and </span>`title`<span offset-key="88afe20ccdef4aab893f54aff46f0ee7:4"> field. (This means that all collections with </span>`create: true`<span offset-key="88afe20ccdef4aab893f54aff46f0ee7:6"> must have a </span>`title`<span offset-key="88afe20ccdef4aab893f54aff46f0ee7:8"> field (a different field can be used via </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/configuration-options/#identifier_field" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="edd844e9bd8a4f529f377844027d3507" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="91bf692eff66449dacaa7c9d04748d65"><code class="r-1vckr1u r-z2wwpe r-uibjmv r-m2pi6t r-1hvjb8t" data-slate-leaf="true" data-offset-key="91bf692eff66449dacaa7c9d04748d65:0">identifier_field</code></span></span></a><span key="1def7839333248aa83e37d61071b003d"><span offset-key="1def7839333248aa83e37d61071b003d:0">).</span></span>

<span key="befd9b0e558e428b906d346a785bda90"><span offset-key="befd9b0e558e428b906d346a785bda90:0">The slug template can also reference a field value by name, eg. </span>`{{title}}`<span offset-key="befd9b0e558e428b906d346a785bda90:2">. If a field name conflicts with a built in template tag name - for example, if you have a field named </span>`slug`<span offset-key="befd9b0e558e428b906d346a785bda90:4">, and would like to reference that field via </span>`{{slug}}`<span offset-key="befd9b0e558e428b906d346a785bda90:6">, you can do so by adding the explicit </span>`fields.`<span offset-key="befd9b0e558e428b906d346a785bda90:8"> prefix, eg. </span>`{{fields.slug}}`<span offset-key="befd9b0e558e428b906d346a785bda90:10">.</span></span>

<span key="9e7d21600611475c97a2af53c954d006">**Available template tags:**</span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="7214f428873d4a67b1a93c46a8969f92"><span offset-key="7214f428873d4a67b1a93c46a8969f92:0">Any field can be referenced by wrapping the field name in double curly braces, eg. </span>`{{author}}`</span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="04c4b191fa4c43a79cebd03252b7b8db">`{{slug}}`<span offset-key="04c4b191fa4c43a79cebd03252b7b8db:1">: a url-safe version of the </span>`title`<span offset-key="04c4b191fa4c43a79cebd03252b7b8db:3"> field (or identifier field) for the file</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="616c8e160aff412db6b9cf4d5088be5a">`{{year}}`<span offset-key="616c8e160aff412db6b9cf4d5088be5a:1">: 4-digit year of the file creation date</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="fa074257c5d2484ab324a7639b45a12f">`{{month}}`<span offset-key="fa074257c5d2484ab324a7639b45a12f:1">: 2-digit month of the file creation date</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="372d9e34ea1646799b5fed2ca4774b31">`{{day}}`<span offset-key="372d9e34ea1646799b5fed2ca4774b31:1">: 2-digit day of the month of the file creation date</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="9930e2f7a30f4003b25c0f32553a1efd">`{{hour}}`<span offset-key="9930e2f7a30f4003b25c0f32553a1efd:1">: 2-digit hour of the file creation date</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="6f02cb3575fa465da428913096d32e93">`{{minute}}`<span offset-key="6f02cb3575fa465da428913096d32e93:1">: 2-digit minute of the file creation date</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="da8eb8a1b40d47279f0ec2564255a52f">`{{second}}`<span offset-key="da8eb8a1b40d47279f0ec2564255a52f:1">: 2-digit second of the file creation date</span></span>

<span key="c2e46fdca0d44fc2b9bb1188efa7c733">**Example:**</span>

1

<span key="121489b8efbf437098c3dc9953ff7095"><span offset-key="121489b8efbf437098c3dc9953ff7095:0">slug: "{{year}}-{{month}}-{{day}}\_{{slug}}"</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="eac8de7edacb45f1aa967ff683ebd01f">**Example using field names:**</span>

1

<span key="3c87ee404c624b6fb9e5bcb2753b1816"><span offset-key="3c87ee404c624b6fb9e5bcb2753b1816:0">slug: "{{year}}-{{month}}-{{day}}\_{{title}}\_{{some\_other\_field}}"</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="83ebc5f73efb41cf9f619282f437d152">**Example using field name that conflicts with a template tag:**</span>

1

<span key="5b8a2a6557004b319e45e31961660294"><span offset-key="5b8a2a6557004b319e45e31961660294:0">slug: "{{year}}-{{month}}-{{day}}\_{{fields.slug}}"</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

### 

<span key="48da11c3cb614053a63f37e1790ac7c6">`preview_path`</span>

<span key="4e464e8d36f740738cebbac18761ef49"><span offset-key="4e464e8d36f740738cebbac18761ef49:0">A string representing the path where content in this collection can be found on the live site. This allows deploy preview links to direct to lead to a specific piece of content rather than the site root of a deploy preview.</span></span>

<span key="68a016856926481e9067f524e21d4188">**Available template tags:**</span>

<span key="9b1a95bc7e8d4eb1acab0b7ef4118849"><span offset-key="9b1a95bc7e8d4eb1acab0b7ef4118849:0">Template tags are the same as those for </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/configuration-options/#slug" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="ebb6f1966f75479aaaadb7fea83819f6" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="17d702adf3224acd83d24559273dfb3b"><span data-offset-key="17d702adf3224acd83d24559273dfb3b:0">slug</span></span></span></a><span key="f13acfb6f16c40d4aaf3234fd9be0084"><span offset-key="f13acfb6f16c40d4aaf3234fd9be0084:0">, with the following exceptions:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="b7418c7cdaf74ec099db87fd76ce8bea">`{{slug}}`<span offset-key="b7418c7cdaf74ec099db87fd76ce8bea:1"> is the entire slug for the current entry (not just the url-safe identifier, as is the case with </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/configuration-options/#slug" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="1375674a8e404767bac6c8090f075541" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="ebdc213cdae6418fbd829ff7d1855897"><code class="r-1vckr1u r-z2wwpe r-uibjmv r-m2pi6t r-1hvjb8t" data-slate-leaf="true" data-offset-key="ebdc213cdae6418fbd829ff7d1855897:0">slug</code><span data-offset-key="ebdc213cdae6418fbd829ff7d1855897:1"> configuration</span></span></span></a><span key="d4091264cea2442687950bcab6df83fe"><span offset-key="d4091264cea2442687950bcab6df83fe:0">)</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="e10ff0c4486040449817c833bfa9be3c"><span offset-key="e10ff0c4486040449817c833bfa9be3c:0">The date based template tags, such as </span>`{{year}}`<span offset-key="e10ff0c4486040449817c833bfa9be3c:2"> and </span>`{{month}}`<span offset-key="e10ff0c4486040449817c833bfa9be3c:4">, are pulled from a date field in your entry, and may require additional configuration - see </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/configuration-options/#preview_path_date_field" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="3de3bdd729314b798d1b2e54306a24a6" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="0373adc29d0343ab9cff1f1bcc8fe123"><code class="r-1vckr1u r-z2wwpe r-uibjmv r-m2pi6t r-1hvjb8t" data-slate-leaf="true" data-offset-key="0373adc29d0343ab9cff1f1bcc8fe123:0">preview_path_date_field</code></span></span></a><span key="b36d7ef6f4894f6d81008674d5fe122e"><span offset-key="b36d7ef6f4894f6d81008674d5fe122e:0"> for details. If a date template tag is used and no date can be found, </span>`preview_path`<span offset-key="b36d7ef6f4894f6d81008674d5fe122e:2"> will be ignored.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="1357554b4086424a9d57c439527c3868">`{{dirname}}`<span offset-key="1357554b4086424a9d57c439527c3868:1"> The path to the file's parent directory, relative to the collection's </span>`folder`<span offset-key="1357554b4086424a9d57c439527c3868:3">.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="0f2251f415504bcc844fcea88d775b11">`{{filename}}`<span offset-key="0f2251f415504bcc844fcea88d775b11:1"> The file name without the extension part.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="200cf561bf9749aab823bba54b4966ce">`{{extension}}`<span offset-key="200cf561bf9749aab823bba54b4966ce:1"> The file extension.</span></span>

<span key="830c0708d0a04190bf004c62ac1a0112">**Examples:**</span>

1

<span key="b29222a9941947e89080217394597bcb"><span offset-key="b29222a9941947e89080217394597bcb:0">collections:</span></span>

2

<span key="56fab425b7a646eba55a350a21c471cb"><span offset-key="56fab425b7a646eba55a350a21c471cb:0"> - name: posts</span></span>

3

<span key="afdd62c7c483406f9e6937f0a80f7f3b"><span offset-key="afdd62c7c483406f9e6937f0a80f7f3b:0"> preview\_path: "blog/{{year}}/{{month}}/{{slug}}"</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

1

<span key="0db7bab2f55c4af19285467fb5841379"><span offset-key="0db7bab2f55c4af19285467fb5841379:0">collections:</span></span>

2

<span key="2c9d3017daaa4d4aaa19852ccfa2c778"><span offset-key="2c9d3017daaa4d4aaa19852ccfa2c778:0"> - name: posts</span></span>

3

<span key="1b880b0b172740429b2bc1f22758ab04"><span offset-key="1b880b0b172740429b2bc1f22758ab04:0"> preview\_path: "blog/{{year}}/{{month}}/{{filename}}.{{extension}}"</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

### 

<span key="07eab558b8db4d8795dd5fdbdb546967">`preview_path_date_field`</span>

<span key="a879e82fdda84eb0ab3f4044f1a92c04"><span offset-key="a879e82fdda84eb0ab3f4044f1a92c04:0">The name of a date field for parsing date-based template tags from </span>`preview_path`<span offset-key="a879e82fdda84eb0ab3f4044f1a92c04:2">. If this field is not provided and </span>`preview_path`<span offset-key="a879e82fdda84eb0ab3f4044f1a92c04:4"> contains date-based template tags (eg. </span>`{{year}}`<span offset-key="a879e82fdda84eb0ab3f4044f1a92c04:6">), Netlify CMS will attempt to infer a usable date field by checking for common date field names, such as </span>`date`<span offset-key="a879e82fdda84eb0ab3f4044f1a92c04:8">. If you find that you need to specify a date field, you can use </span>`preview_path_date_field`<span offset-key="a879e82fdda84eb0ab3f4044f1a92c04:10"> to tell Netlify CMS which field to use for preview path template tags.</span></span>

<span key="7bb5469f2557446796ec838baa09461f">**Example:**</span>

1

<span key="c68ca4cd34984e37bef8cb9dd8955ada"><span offset-key="c68ca4cd34984e37bef8cb9dd8955ada:0">collections:</span></span>

2

<span key="0e4f814fa33046049f0e943808bdb636"><span offset-key="0e4f814fa33046049f0e943808bdb636:0"> - name: posts</span></span>

3

<span key="a23e0601b5074f08baf73a0b3def3e31"><span offset-key="a23e0601b5074f08baf73a0b3def3e31:0"> preview\_path\_date\_field: "updated\_on"</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

### 

<span key="0091b3d4552e40d98b81c467215cd41a">`fields`</span>

<span key="528ebcc52c844ae69769ca76b99047b9"><span offset-key="528ebcc52c844ae69769ca76b99047b9:0">The </span>`fields`<span offset-key="528ebcc52c844ae69769ca76b99047b9:2"> option maps editor UI widgets to field-value pairs in the saved file. The order of the fields in your Netlify CMS </span>`config.yml`<span offset-key="528ebcc52c844ae69769ca76b99047b9:4"> file determines their order in the editor UI and in the saved file.</span></span>

<span key="cfcb0beafe02425aba1a2528465f27f1">`fields`<span offset-key="cfcb0beafe02425aba1a2528465f27f1:1"> accepts a list of collection objects, each with the following options:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="716713f5a8094929a835e77b0a70a645">`name`<span offset-key="716713f5a8094929a835e77b0a70a645:1"> (required): unique identifier for the field, used as the key when referenced in other contexts (like the </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/widgets/#relation" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="6993ed35d7394a85b346974b0ae06335" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="783773c3cc7343d2905ebe03fc5d3985"><span data-offset-key="783773c3cc7343d2905ebe03fc5d3985:0">relation widget</span></span></span></a><span key="83e2524739594412a6746781d598e33a"><span offset-key="83e2524739594412a6746781d598e33a:0">)</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="6c39486ac8fc4344a24f57745f7ae06f">`label`<span offset-key="6c39486ac8fc4344a24f57745f7ae06f:1">: label for the field in the editor UI; defaults to the value of </span>`name`</span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="05898268bc714ced8e11a4b55284d138">`widget`<span offset-key="05898268bc714ced8e11a4b55284d138:1">: defines editor UI and inputs and file field data types; details in </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/widgets" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="e63659a7922d4445911b78a0e7cf1706" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="1d1681c44ee943ae98d4a010dd7c14c4"><span data-offset-key="1d1681c44ee943ae98d4a010dd7c14c4:0">Widgets</span></span></span></a><span key="79b4b8e2c44a4199a90979c3ec315268"><span offset-key="79b4b8e2c44a4199a90979c3ec315268:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="cdd6e36c77b847ee8dd6d87642be82f2">`default`<span offset-key="cdd6e36c77b847ee8dd6d87642be82f2:1">: specify a default value for a field; available for most widget types (see </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/widgets" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="3209248e29684747a8502f261128d916" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="3b5d6f216ffe43168e04b54ba6564b1a"><span data-offset-key="3b5d6f216ffe43168e04b54ba6564b1a:0">Widgets</span></span></span></a><span key="2f24035e97594d3baca442d82df55166"><span offset-key="2f24035e97594d3baca442d82df55166:0"> for details on each widget type). Please note that field default value only works for folder collection type.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="a3490a488cb445f5b9cfdc90ebebb88f">`required`<span offset-key="a3490a488cb445f5b9cfdc90ebebb88f:1">: specify as </span>`false`<span offset-key="a3490a488cb445f5b9cfdc90ebebb88f:3"> to make a field optional; defaults to </span>`true`</span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="fbb46b646c564504a73055862775c78a">`pattern`<span offset-key="fbb46b646c564504a73055862775c78a:1">: add field validation by specifying a list with a regex pattern and an error message; more extensive validation can be achieved with </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/custom-widgets/#advanced-field-validation" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="0d3c7bc9ba834364a631302ed0593e13" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="70d334f0e82a48b1a7e9fd008fef006b"><span data-offset-key="70d334f0e82a48b1a7e9fd008fef006b:0">custom widgets</span></span></span></a><span key="40c877dd56aa4f3e88cbee70210094a6"><span offset-key="40c877dd56aa4f3e88cbee70210094a6:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">â€‹</span></span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="5c0169e6b1524272bbfd6eb2a8ffb97b">`comment`<span offset-key="5c0169e6b1524272bbfd6eb2a8ffb97b:1">: optional comment to add before the field (only supported for </span>`yaml`<span offset-key="5c0169e6b1524272bbfd6eb2a8ffb97b:3">)</span></span>

<span key="fc0a79bd7a394b248307e71a57657b3a"><span offset-key="fc0a79bd7a394b248307e71a57657b3a:0">In files with frontmatter, one field should be named </span>`body`<span offset-key="fc0a79bd7a394b248307e71a57657b3a:2">. This special field represents the section of the document (usually markdown) that comes after the frontmatter.</span></span>

<span key="22d2b3a4cf4842ad860fac3c990d9010">**Example:**</span>

1

<span key="6873ae084472431a95e530e39f38ab1b"><span offset-key="6873ae084472431a95e530e39f38ab1b:0">fields:</span></span>

2

<span key="e5d2406a32cf4ddba71bced0afac58c7"><span offset-key="e5d2406a32cf4ddba71bced0afac58c7:0"> - label: "Title"</span></span>

3

<span key="fa90f904aac0441d958b96559b8461ce"><span offset-key="fa90f904aac0441d958b96559b8461ce:0"> name: "title"</span></span>

4

<span key="d1b4f3131b104739bac123da85537dd5"><span offset-key="d1b4f3131b104739bac123da85537dd5:0"> widget: "string"</span></span>

5

<span key="549edac6f51c41b6882f3b6804441e52"><span offset-key="549edac6f51c41b6882f3b6804441e52:0"> pattern: \['.{20,}', "Must have at least 20 characters"\]</span></span>

6

<span key="5cd34c33b8284747962052b78ed39d77"><span offset-key="5cd34c33b8284747962052b78ed39d77:0"> - {label: "Layout", name: "layout", widget: "hidden", default: "blog"}</span></span>

7

<span key="02fe7955bee14084b1e2dfadc3fafda0"><span offset-key="02fe7955bee14084b1e2dfadc3fafda0:0"> - {label: "Featured Image", name: "thumbnail", widget: "image", required: false}</span></span>

8

<span key="c67c776d95be4e09a5a2926c95b2ff0f"><span offset-key="c67c776d95be4e09a5a2926c95b2ff0f:0"> - {label: "Body", name: "body", widget: "markdown"}</span></span>

9

<span key="7c3eec8c084c458e80426fade9dcb3d8"><span offset-key="7c3eec8c084c458e80426fade9dcb3d8:0"> comment: 'This is a multiline\\ncomment'</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

### 

<span key="e11292e498974def930e8fc132cc75a3">`editor`</span>

<span key="7b521fa5b30f45afb295a283e3e43f86"><span offset-key="7b521fa5b30f45afb295a283e3e43f86:0">This setting changes options for the editor view of a collection or a file inside a files collection. It has one option so far:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="fe85532176904c48b2d7af8dba8bf36d">`preview`<span offset-key="fe85532176904c48b2d7af8dba8bf36d:1">: set to </span>`false`<span offset-key="fe85532176904c48b2d7af8dba8bf36d:3"> to disable the preview pane for this collection or file; defaults to </span>`true`</span>

<span key="d0240bfe5ce740ecbb3be4e93cc9c5cb">**Example:**</span>

1

<span key="f8fd6f591ee24ce3945d841355d434a8"><span offset-key="f8fd6f591ee24ce3945d841355d434a8:0"> editor:</span></span>

2

<span key="8721b9196e0548abaab355c66f3a181c"><span offset-key="8721b9196e0548abaab355c66f3a181c:0"> preview: false</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="c7350cf6293e4d3abc7144e0ab2a9455">**Note**<span offset-key="c7350cf6293e4d3abc7144e0ab2a9455:1">: Setting this as a top level configuration will set the default for all collections</span></span>

### 

<span key="818d8f0eb3d549c8bf134988c84cb006">`summary`</span>

<span key="59ec75c915774c5abba09016c6b1246f"><span offset-key="59ec75c915774c5abba09016c6b1246f:0">This setting allows the customization of the collection list view. Similar to the </span>`slug`<span offset-key="59ec75c915774c5abba09016c6b1246f:2"> field, a string with templates can be used to include values of different fields, e.g. </span>`{{title}}`<span offset-key="59ec75c915774c5abba09016c6b1246f:4">. This option over-rides the default of </span>`title`<span offset-key="59ec75c915774c5abba09016c6b1246f:6"> field and </span>`identifier_field`<span offset-key="59ec75c915774c5abba09016c6b1246f:8">.</span></span>

<span key="10d2dbc4b2f6472ab131d1de895824fc">**Available template tags:**</span>

<span key="acbf0d7bcdc547b7846958f32a5b50bd"><span offset-key="acbf0d7bcdc547b7846958f32a5b50bd:0">Template tags are the same as those for </span></span><a href="https://www.netlifycms.org/docs/configuration-options/#slug" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="d1b1842edfef47409a625925ba3e5284" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-61857_259-61858-237__"><span data-key="d3278631a5a84ae8a36b1a5e308c0279"><span data-offset-key="d3278631a5a84ae8a36b1a5e308c0279:0">slug</span></span></span></a><span key="256d81e843124638b2706328b2d927be"><span offset-key="256d81e843124638b2706328b2d927be:0">, with the following additions:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="0c900a64c5374e09a9b86734757f18e0">`{{dirname}}`<span offset-key="0c900a64c5374e09a9b86734757f18e0:1"> The path to the file's parent directory, relative to the collection's </span>`folder`<span offset-key="0c900a64c5374e09a9b86734757f18e0:3">.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="e8e0d62509974577ba4061857b853068">`{{filename}}`<span offset-key="e8e0d62509974577ba4061857b853068:1"> The file name without the extension part.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="bacf068d7cfb49779db06949e5cd1068">`{{extension}}`<span offset-key="bacf068d7cfb49779db06949e5cd1068:1"> The file extension.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="f1503ab3e5f74932937330e2f3e4fd94">`{{commit_date}}`<span offset-key="f1503ab3e5f74932937330e2f3e4fd94:1"> The file commit date on supported backends (git based backends).</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm r-1vzi8xi" />

    <span key="7adc0c4752ac421faba81b5ea5e7a34f">`{{commit_author}}`<span offset-key="7adc0c4752ac421faba81b5ea5e7a34f:1"> The file author date on supported backends (git based backends).</span></span>

<span key="8c2e885938f54afe8c74ae4997369268">**Example**</span>

1

<span key="a4f07bb4043e47239b728abbceef2dee"><span offset-key="a4f07bb4043e47239b728abbceef2dee:0"> summary: "Version: {{version}} - {{title}}"</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

### 

<span key="12857ab31796422fb6c493902bf3e51a">`sortable_fields`</span>

<span key="98c70357d5a448659601dbe442433257"><span offset-key="98c70357d5a448659601dbe442433257:0">An optional list of sort fields to show in the UI.</span></span>

<span key="0e781167e86243a5bc813edf7431b77b"><span offset-key="0e781167e86243a5bc813edf7431b77b:0">Defaults to inferring </span>`title`<span offset-key="0e781167e86243a5bc813edf7431b77b:2">, </span>`date`<span offset-key="0e781167e86243a5bc813edf7431b77b:4">, </span>`author`<span offset-key="0e781167e86243a5bc813edf7431b77b:6"> and </span>`description`<span offset-key="0e781167e86243a5bc813edf7431b77b:8"> fields and will also show </span>`Update On`<span offset-key="0e781167e86243a5bc813edf7431b77b:10"> sort field in git based backends.</span></span>

<span key="53f03d110d1d4221b516b8e3570ebfbf"><span offset-key="53f03d110d1d4221b516b8e3570ebfbf:0">When </span>`author`<span offset-key="53f03d110d1d4221b516b8e3570ebfbf:2"> field can't be inferred commit author will be used.</span></span>

<span key="3db94e5d873b4421a2821186aa81e904">**Example**</span>

1

<span key="012caecf8da847d28c9f05e5b0f3dd1d"><span offset-key="012caecf8da847d28c9f05e5b0f3dd1d:0"> # use dot notation for nested fields</span></span>

2

<span key="3f71b427740b4fd8a985a8c556e7e531"><span offset-key="3f71b427740b4fd8a985a8c556e7e531:0"> sortable\_fields: \['commit\_date', 'title', 'commit\_author', 'language.en'\]</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="fe589eba8ba14af88bc3ea32b9c74bd9">`view_filters`</span>

<span key="0dc2d41122624d17ae6ba1da4769d0b4"><span offset-key="0dc2d41122624d17ae6ba1da4769d0b4:0">An optional list of predefined view filters to show in the UI.</span></span>

<span key="ff201f12c10f4b6a881af2b8ebd50ee0"><span offset-key="ff201f12c10f4b6a881af2b8ebd50ee0:0">Defaults to an empty list.</span></span>

2

<span key="00b9c35103404308a338af14a1c6f412"><span offset-key="00b9c35103404308a338af14a1c6f412:0"> - label: "Alice's and Bob's Posts"</span></span>

3

<span key="e84cd199ee7542f58918a0a473c48afd"><span offset-key="e84cd199ee7542f58918a0a473c48afd:0"> field: author</span></span>

4

<span key="37062561c71c422b8acf9a26c9379ed7"><span offset-key="37062561c71c422b8acf9a26c9379ed7:0"> pattern: 'Alice|Bob'</span></span>

5

<span key="c9da081a29a149d49c1f3c5851079644"><span offset-key="c9da081a29a149d49c1f3c5851079644:0"> - label: 'Posts published in 2020'</span></span>

6

<span key="f632b21a72794157abb361a477e3404c"><span offset-key="f632b21a72794157abb361a477e3404c:0"> field: date</span></span>

<span key="a947fa9cf50941a2a8314d24d07e74b0"><span offset-key="a947fa9cf50941a2a8314d24d07e74b0:0"> - label: Drafts</span></span>

9

<span key="55d8a97a8dc24e9899627feffcf7c36f"><span offset-key="55d8a97a8dc24e9899627feffcf7c36f:0"> field: draft</span></span>

10

<span key="4caecc8a37c34bcaa1ade7b530545e81"><span offset-key="4caecc8a37c34bcaa1ade7b530545e81:0"> pattern: true</span></span>

<span key="322372ed1f434481b8d0ac59a7c0d3c1"><span offset-key="322372ed1f434481b8d0ac59a7c0d3c1:0">Defaults to an empty list.</span></span>
